lead_paragraph: These are the lamentations of the 68 Percent — the significant majority of Republicans in the state who are immune to Donald J. Trump’s charms and entreaties.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Martin contributed reporting from Manchester, N.H., and Thomas Kaplan from Laconia and Wolfeboro, N.H.
byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.print_headline: A G.O.P. Majority in New Hampshire Pipes Up: We’re Not for Trump
headline.main: A G.O.P. Majority in New Hampshire Pipes Up: We’re Not for Donald Trump

snippet: These are the lamentations of the 68 Percent — the significant majority of Republicans in the state who are immune to Donald J. Trump’s charms and entreaties.
abstract: Many New Hampshire Republicans express doubts about accuracy of polls showing Donald Trump as GOP frontrunner in state's presidential primary; polls show 68 percent of Republicans in state do not support Trump, and interviews with some of those voters reveal he is widely viewed as untrustworthy.
